const getFileIcon = (name: string, isDir: boolean): string => {
    if (isDir) return '\u{1F4C1}'
    const ext = name.split('.').pop()?.toLowerCase()
    switch (ext) {
      case 'ts':
      case 'tsx':
        return '\u{1F535}'
      case 'js':
      case 'jsx':
        return '\u{1F7E1}'
      case 'json':
        return '\u{1F7E2}'
      case 'css':
        return '\u{1F7E3}'
      case 'md':
        return '\u{1F4DD}'
      case 'html':
        return '\u{1F7E0}'
      default:
        return '\u{1F4C4}'
    }
  }

  const sortedChildren
